text: [Music]
go big show is back and bigger than ever
to celebrate the season 2 premiere
tonight we teamed up with six flags to
give fans an opportunity to go big
inspired by our contestants death
defying stunts for the first time ever
we reimagined one of the most popular
rides at six flags fiesta texas
[Music]
we swap traditional skyscreamer swings
with go big show flying harnesses that
aren't for the faint of heart can you
say extreme
riders are taken on the ride of their
life as they soar 200 feet in the air
head first at full speed for a limited
time treat yourself to the most omg
sized take on everyone's favorite theme
park classic the go big funnel cake at
six flags
join our judges cody rhodes jennifer
nettles rosario dawson t payne and host
burke kreischer tonight for the premiere
of go big show at 9 pm 8 central on tbs
